entry.title: Django Day Copenhagen 2020
entry.summary: This was my first ever assignment and it went so well I want to do more of them. I learned a lot during such a short period. I got better at digitizing my work and coloring svgs. There was a lot of communication back and forth via Email, but Django â€¦
entry.content:
This was my first ever assignment and it went so well I want to do more of them. I learned a lot during such a short period. I got better at digitizing my work and coloring svgs. There was a lot of communication back and forth via Email, but Django Denmark was such a lovely organization to work together with.

Thank you for the lovely collaboration, for your inspiration and your friendly feedback.
